div.p:
Welcome to Central Lee Community School District. Central Lee is made up of numerous small towns (Donnellson, Argyle, Montrose) and has a large percentage of our population open enroll into the district from surrounding communities. We are well known for our exemplary staff, strong academic program, and terrific offerings of extra-curricular activities.
At Central Lee, we are currently working on implementing our five year strategic plan in which our priority is to create a culture where all students are expected to achieve a better tomorrow! Whether you are are a student, parent, staff member, or community member, we look forward to partnering with you to make Central Lee an even better school district for kids!
Our Mission Statement: Central Lee CSD will prepare lifelong learners who are independent thinkers, value themselves and others, and have the knowledge and skills to become productive citizens.
Students, parents, employees and others doing business with or performing services for the Central Lee Community School District are hereby notified that this school district does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, marital status, creed, sexual orientation, gender identity or disability in admission or access to, or treatment in, its programs and activities. Any person having inquiries concerning the school district's compliance with the regulations implementing Title VI, Title VII, Title IX, the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), § 504 or Iowa Code § 280.3 is directed to contact: Middle School Principal Central Lee K-8 Building 2642 Highway 218 Donnellson, IA 52625 319-250-1201 or 319-835-5139 who has been designated by the school district to coordinate the school district's efforts to comply with the regulations implementing Title VI, Title VII, Title IX, the ADA, § 504 and Iowa Code 280.3.
